content.rendered:
Buddha Air Pvt. Ltd is an airline based in Jawalakhel, Lalitpur District, Nepal, near Patan. It operates domestic as well as international services within Nepal and India, serving mainly large towns and cities in Nepal, linking Kathmandu with ten destinations and Varanasi of India since its establishment. Its main base is Tribhuvan International Airport, Kathmandu.

 

 

Queries handled by Buddha Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Royal Club

List of Buddha Air Offices :

Nepal – Telephone Reservation
Nepal – Biratnagar
Nepal – Dharan Sales Office
Nepal – Bharatpur
Nepal – Dhangadhi
Nepal – Bhadrapur
Nepal – Nepalgunj
Nepal – Tumlingtar
Nepal – Janakpur
Nepal – Kathmandu Airport
Nepal – Pokhara
Nepal – Simara
India – Near Temple Town Hotel, Varanasi, India
Nepal – Marketing Department (head Office)
Nepal – Royal Club (frequent Flyer Program)
Nepal – Online Reservation
Nepal – Sinamangal Sales Office
Nepal – City Sales Office Hattisar, Ktm
Nepal – Technical Department
Nepal – Bhairahawa
Nepal – Sundhara Counter
Nepal – Cargo Office Sinamangal Kathmandu, Nepal
Nepal – Surkhet Station
Nepal – Buddha Holidays / Packages

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Buddha Air Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Buddha Air: (click on the stars below)
